nodes.text: Unidentified captain of the Ranoraki family's personal guard

A male individual served as the captain of the Ranoraki family's personal guard, protecting their compound on Hetzal Prime. When the Great Hyperspace Disaster threatened the Hetzal system, the captain was charged with keeping out a crowd of desperate civilians who were attempting to gain access to the family's starship. Upon arriving at the scene, Jedi Master Loden Greatstorm challenged the captain, eventually persuading him to open the compound's gates after Greatstorm casually indicated he was willing to fight the Ranorakis' entire guard force.
